nodes.text: The Starflash was an alien weapon that was considered to be terrible by the Mitth family of the Chiss Ascendancy. Senior Aide Mitth'iv'iklo spoke to the newly appointed Patriarch of the family, Mitth'urf'ianico, that once he had settled into his new home, the aide would recount the ancient history of the Mitth that was truthful and suppressed, and that he would inform the Patriarch on the weapon known as the Starflash.
